name: Little Space Hunter
description:
(Click anywhere on the game to set focus)

Arrow Keys Move Left and Right, Up to Jump

'Z' to Fire.  Hold Down 'Z' to Fire Further.

You are a little space hunter armed only with a kinetically reductive  sling shot.  Try to collect all of the Space Whales to win the game.  Landing your shots on top of a whale will bring it down closer to the surface of the planet.  Once it's close enough you can mount the whale and ride it up to the collection device.

You have a limited amount of oxygen that is replenished when you successfully collect a Space Whale.  Good Luck.

Hint- try to land your shots on top of the whale.
